scc_rules.description: Check whether Event Streams is accessible only by using private endpoints Found in: resource_address: module.event_streams.ibm_resource_instance.es_instance
scc_rules.ignore_reason: Private endpoint option is not present instead private_network_enabled property is present in SCC scan. (Slack discussion at https://ibm-cloudplatform.slack.com/archives/C0131B59XB4/p1684155362026309)
